column4: I have a thinkpad t520 running 10.4 LTS.  Loathe though I am to leave LTS, I need to upgrade to get various things working.  What's the safest way to do this?
I've already backed up my machine, of course...
Dang, was hoping not to spend the weekend reinstalling and reconfiguring everything.
download the iso; burn it to cd/usb; boot off it; click install; select upgrade when presented with the option
